name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-requirement-targeting-oneway-dependency-nodejs
title: Specify relationships between app capabilities
shortDescription: Microsoft M365 RT sample app in Node.js which specify one-way dependency relationships between app capabilities using elementRelationshipSet.
longDescription: Microsoft M365 RT sample app in Node.js which specify one-way-dependency relationships between app capabilities (using elementRelationshipSet) and functionality requirements of a particular app capability (using hostMustSupportFunctionalities).

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing one-way dependency relationships between app capabilities

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
